MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Helsby, affecting properties in Towers Lane and surrounding area. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:38PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.03AM on 8th March 2021.
